descriptions.hero: Describe what problems your project solves. Avoid using popular phrases or sentences. Instead, think of something by which people will remember you.
descriptions.about: The rise of the crypto economy promises a world where everyone has access to open and secure financial systems. But this future isnâ€™t guaranteed, the bridge to this new world must be built.
descriptions.aboutToken: Share some details about tokenomics. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Donec at ligula consequat ante pharetra eleifend ut et diam.
descriptions.rewards: All participants in the Project Crowdloan will receive DOTS as a reward for their contributions. The amount of the rewards will depend on the total amount of DOTS which has been contributed by others at the time of your contribution.
descriptions.contributors: Here you can shortly say something about the contributors
descriptions.faq: Have a question that is not answered? You can contact us at

cards.description: This is a feature description. How would that work? Why would that be useful? Who could use it? Think of the value.

faq.howLongToVerify: How long does it take to verify my account?
faq.howLongToVerifyAnswer: Your deposits are instantly converted to US Dollar Coin (USDC). 1 USDC = $1 Dollar. We build on top of USDC technology that enables higher interest rates, faster transfers, and no fees.
faq.howLongWithdrawl: How long will my withdrawal take to show up in my bank account?
faq.howToChangeEmail: How do I change my email?
faq.howToChangeAddress: How do I change my address?

descriptions.contribution12Dot: Contribution for the first 500,000 DOT will receive 12 DOT per contributed DOT as a reward.
descriptions.contribution8Dot: Contribution for the raised xxx between 500,000 - 1,500,000 DOT will receive 8 DOT per contributed DOT as a reward.
descriptions.contribution4Dot: Contribution for the raised xxx between 1,500,000 - 3,000,000 DOT will receive 4 DOT per contributed DOT as a reward.

bulletLists.failureCompensation: The failure compensation in Batch 1 and Batch 2 will be distributed by the Project team.
bulletLists.compensationRatio: The compensation ratio is XXX : DOT = 0.12 : 1

descriptions.contribution8Dot: Contribution for the raised xxx between 500,000 - 1,500,000 DOT will receive 8 DOT per contributed DOT as a reward.

404.sorryNoPage: Sorry, we couldn't find this page.
404.weHaveOtherPages: But don't worry, you can find plenty of other things on our homepage.

contribution.theAboveContribution: The above contribution should amount to more than minimum contribution and less than the remaining value.

mobileInfo.inOrderToContribute: In order to contribute to fund, copy the account address ID and open your dedicated Polkadot wallet app on your device and use this address to process transaction.
